column5: Just wondering if a site exists that tracks the exchange rates through the year. Thanks much!! Steve

[font color=green size=3][b]I'm not sure what you mean by "through the year", but I use www.royalbank.com to check current rates. Click on rates, then the foriegn exchange converter, they are one of the larger Canadian banks.
VMS, Try this site www.com/ucc/ Mark
VMS, Sorry, I didn't get the whole address on the above post, try thiswww.xe.com/ucc/ Mark

I know about finding the current exchange rate, but I was wondering about a site that tracks all dates and keeps them posted. The rate fluctuates just like any other rate from day to day, so I am looking for trends...not just the current exchange. Sorry if I did not make that clear in my post. Steve
